subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan scored 21 points and Michael Finley added a season-high 20 to lead the San Antonio Spurs to a 105-98 victory last night over the visiting Memphis Grizzlies.
snippet: Tim Duncan scored 21 points and Michael Finley added a season-high 20 to lead the San Antonio Spurs to a 105-98 victory last night over the visiting Memphis Grizzlies.
